main event: A bright bluish-white UFO was observed near Pepperrell Air Force Base in Windsor, Newfoundland on October 19, 1952. It remained stationary for a period of time before moving very rapidly on a straight course to the north-northwest and disappearing.
interesting points: The UFO remained stationary for a considerable period of time before moving at a very high rate of speed on a straight course.
The object appeared to be a bright bluish-white color, flaring and pulsating at irregular intervals.
No radar contact or visual observation of the UFO was reported by intelligence personnel at Goose Air Force Base.
It emitted a bright reflection on the ground, resembling bright sunlight.
Observers described it as very high and traveling at a terrific rate of speed.
